channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blade Su The Coder

item.title: Start editing learning note for GNU make.
item.description: GNU make should be most generous building tool or fundation of large building system for C/C++ project. Here I start to write some note for problems when applying GNU make into my projects. It should be updated here: learning/building_tool.

item.title: Coding in C, C standard should be most reliable reference material than everything.
item.description: Recently, I start to code a lot in c language. One of my studying material is “Head First C” written by David Griffith. And I am so confused about an example it talking about XOR encrption. void encrpt(char *mes) { while (*mes) { *mes = *mes ^ 31; mes++; } } } This code could be compiled without any error or warning (Apple LLVM version 9.1.0 (clang-902.0.39.1)). But I am really curious about how XOR operator worker on the two operand *mes and the integer literal 31.

item.title: My first post
item.description: Thank you for reading this post. This is the first one in my blog. Since I had connected to internect, I got a lot of knowlege from enormous amount of website. However it really hard to digest and organize all of them. So I start this blog to put my idea and information collected. If I take something wrong, or you gain from something here. Please give me feedback, thank you.
